nav.confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to logout of {{email}}

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions or ready to start your project? We're here to help! Contact us using the form.

hero.description: Unlock your language potential with expert teachers from around the globe. Whether you're a beginner or advanced learner.

cards.title: Select a Language
cards.description: Select from a wide range of languages, from popular choices like English and Spanish to unique options like Arabic, Korean, Turkish, and Russian.

cards.title: Book Your Classes
cards.description: Schedule lessons at times that work for you. Learn one-on-one with experienced teachers.

cards.title: Learn & Practice
cards.description: Join live sessions with expert teachers, access interactive learning materials.

cards.title: Track Your Progress
cards.description: Enjoy personalized feedback after every session, track your progress, and stay on course to achieve your language goals.

sendMessage.description: Let the tutor know about you, your learning targets, and any questions you have.

myClasses.noClass: It seems you don't have any classes scheduled yet... 😅

formValidation.title: Please Fill The Form
formValidation.description: It looks like you did not fill all the necessary fields

messageConfirmation.title: We Got Your Message
messageConfirmation.description: Our team has recieved your message! We will respond as soon as possible 😊

messageError.title: Oops Something Went Wrong
messageError.description: Please try again later or directly email us at info@yoff.academy

paymentDown.title: Payment System is Down
paymentDown.description: Oh, it seems our payment system is currently down. Our support team will get in touch with you soon for further information.

classCanceled.title: Class Cancelled Successfully
classCanceled.description: Your class has been cancelled and your credits refunded.

classCanceledError.title: Failed to cancel class
classCanceledError.description: Oh, something went wrong. Please try again later. If the issue persists please contact support.

messageError.title: Oops Something Went Wrong
messageError.description: Please try again later or directly email us at info@yoff.academy

recievedMessage.title: {{teacherName}} Received Your Message
recievedMessage.description: We have sent your message to {{teacherName}} 😊

loginFailed.title: Login Failed
loginFailed.description: Something went wrong while logging in

loginFailed.title: Login Failed
loginFailed.description: Something went wrong while logging in

creditsError.title: Insufficent Credits
creditsError.description: It looks like you don't have enough credits to schedule this class. Please add more credits to continue 😊

genericError.title: Something Went Wrong
genericError.description: Oops! Something went wrong while scheduling your class. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists 🙁

dateError.title: Given Date is Not Available
dateError.description: It looks like the date you have picked is already booked. Please try booking another date 😊

scheduleSuccess.title: Class Scheduled
scheduleSuccess.description: Your class has been successfully scheduled! We're thrilled to have you as part of our community 🌟
